mainBoard.flavorText: Successful battles start with knowing who's worth fighting.
mainBoard.name: Exclusion Mage

mainBoard.name: Crookclaw Transmuter

rulings.text: Because damage remains marked on a creature until the damage is removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to a creature may become lethal if you switch its power and toughness during that turn.

Effects that switch a creature's power and toughness apply after all other effects, regardless of when those effects began to apply. For instance, if you target a 1/2 creature then give it +2/+0 later in the turn, it's a 2/3 creature, not a 4/1 creature.
Switching a creature's power and toughness twice (or any even number of times) effectively returns the creature to the power and toughness it had before any switches.

mainBoard.text:
Flash
Flying
When Crookclaw Transmuter enters, switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

mainBoard.text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

Возьмите карту.

foreignData.flavorText: 水晶球涌动着泰菲力鹏洛客火花的力量。尤依拉带给他的是祝福，还是诅咒？
foreignData.name: 抉择
foreignData.text:
占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）
抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 水晶球湧動著泰菲力鵬洛客火花的力量。尤依菈帶給他的是祝福，還是詛咒？
foreignData.name: 抉擇
foreignData.text:
占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）
抽一張牌。

mainBoard.name: Opt
mainBoard.originalText:
Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Draw a card.

mainBoard.name: Riptide Laboratory
mainBoard.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}{U}, {T}: Return target Wizard you control to its owner's hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.
mainBoard.name: Thriving Isle
mainBoard.text:
Thriving Isle enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
